clean_data: Network Administrator span lNetworkspan span lAdministratorspan Lansdale PA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Network Administrator Zain Zambia Lusaka August 2007 to August 2010 Responsibilities Configuration routers Configuration of switches Configuration of ASA and PIX firewalls Administration of Ericssons RSG system Network monitoring using MRTG System administration eg Windows Server OS and Linux Accomplishments Documented the network Introduced reliability by making certain components redundant Patched all routers with secure IOS Secured the networks within and without using CISCO ASA and PIX Skills Used Both technical and professional skills This was important because I had to work with people from different countries and cultures Sometimes I physically worked with people and at times I did it remotely In particular I worked with people from companies in the USA Belgium Netherlands China and India Education Masters in Computer Science University of Stavanger Stavanger 2010 to 2012 CertificationsLicenses Security March 2008 to Present It outlines the importance of security within the IT infrastructure and how it can be proactively implemented
